Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Cup
Description: Relatively tall cup with a barely noticeable ring base, flared hemispherical body and a flat lip cut with a knife. The common clay, fine, orange, compact, heterogeneous (with mica and carbonates) has been polished. After the firing process, a mark in the shape of a nefer sign was incised under the lip.
